function ERU_EP05_16()
    -- .転-2【3月第1週】「ボク姫と戦姫」
    SaveData.Title = "ボク姫と戦姫"

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024cd")
    -- //BU：エルメス（笑顔・ラスボス）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM13.wav",0,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0559.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Ladies & Gentle Giiiirls<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Weeds! Guests eveeeeryone<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0560.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Now, now, now! It's time for the once-a-year big event to decide the top of Yuriai Private Academy, the Princess Election!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0561.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Today, the contenders for the throne of Princess are the current Princess, myself, Hermes Himegami, and!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0301.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "A superstar who was a big hit at the Hakuyousai Festival! Now rising to represent Yuriai Private Academy’s most beautiful girl, Battle Princess Erika-chan!" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0563.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "So! Tell us which one of us is cuter, and share your feelings~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    -- //SE：歓声（MAX)
PLAY_SE("SEf001.wav")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //CG：ステージ上のエリカ（対・エルメス）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EVa001ah")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_ERU03ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
	STOP_SE("SEf001.wav",1000)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0564.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Alrighty, let me explain the rules of this Princess Election<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0565.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The appeal theme is ‘freedom’! From now on, Erica-chan and I will take turns showing off our free-form appeals<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0566.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The audience, please watch and vote for the one you want to support using the tablet at hand<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_ERU03ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 600, -185, 80, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0567.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "By the way, the tablets for the guests are provided by one of the board members, the president of Houou Denki, <r=ほうおういん>Hououin</r><r=いかづち> Isoto</r> -chan! Thanks, Zucchi!<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"EV01_BUS_ERU03ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,570,-160)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0568.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "And then, after each of us performs a full ten minutes of appeal, the one with the most votes wins! Now, let's open the current voting percentages!!!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024cd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //CI：得票率 エルメス40：エリカ60 162
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI162a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //SE：歓声（中）
PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav")

    MSG([[ As the voting percentages displayed, cheers broke out. Surprisingly, I was leading Hermes-san in the vote percentage. ]])

    MSG([[ The results of all our efforts up to today were clearly reflected in the numbers. ]])

    MSG([[ We had taken one step closer to the outcome we aimed for. ]])

STOP_SE("SEf002.wav",1000)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2368.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (If it’s Hermes-san, she’s probably itching to appeal and can’t hold back. As planned, it’s best to let her go first.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ch")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-800,200)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ERU03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0569.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Itchy... Itchy..." ]])

    MSG([[ Bingo. ]])

    MSG([[ You can tell by the expression. This is genuinely the face of someone who wants to delight the audience even one second sooner. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_ERU03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0570.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Sorry, Erika-chan! I can’t hold back any longer, so I’ll start my appeal now!!!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024cd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

STOP_BGM(1000)
PLAY_BGM("BGM17.wav",1000,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0571.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The theme is definitely ‘Cute’! I’ll use the full ten minutes to sing and dance and make everyone happyーーーーーーーーー<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"><sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes-san started the live with her usual, no— even higher energy than usual. ]])

    -- //SE：黄色い声援
PLAY_SE("SEf007.wav",0,true)

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2369.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ha—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The moment I heard her singing, I almost lost focus. ]])

    MSG([[ The cheers exploded loudly. The audience went wild. Hermes-san’s voting percentage soared in real time. ]])

    MSG([[ Just as I had observed close up before: a dazzling beauty like a shining sun, powerful dancing, and a sharp singing voice. ]])

    MSG([[ Unlike before, she didn’t just show one note of ‘cute’ but occasionally showed melancholic, mature expressions. ]])

    MSG([[ That added an accent that raised the power of Hermes-san’s performance even more. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2370.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "That expression belongs to Armeria-san... truly, two personalities are merged." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Just as Nemesia-san said, the personality integration seems to have been successfully completed. ]])

    MSG([[ If there was any opening to exploit, it would be the side effects of personality integration, so the sense of urgency increased. ]])

    MSG([[ As expected, this is where the gap forms. But if this ends peacefully, I can’t connect it to my plan’s beginning. ]])

    MSG([[ —It’s okay. There’s no way nothing will happen. ]])

    MSG([[ I continued to watch Hermes-san’s appeal carefully. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0572.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I’m not stopping yet today! I’ll really boost the mood with a medley of my signature songs!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU03ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0573.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Get excited to see if your favorite songs are included! Now, muuusiiic<sprite="Emoji" name="star"> staaaarrrrrt<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])
    -- //注釈：￥はハート

    -- //SE：黄色い声援
PLAY_SE("SEf007.wav")

    MSG([[ Even though I must have seen these dances many times already, I couldn’t look away. The impact of having lost the other self called Armeria was not felt at all. ]])

    MSG([[ Every movement, expression, and singing voice was more refined each time, making my heart race. ]])

    MSG([[ Although Hermes-san is at the top, her cuteness continues to grow. ]])

	STOP_SE("SEf007.wav",1000)

    -- //BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 0,true)

    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Suddenly, the stage lights went out. ]])

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024cd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ The lighting quickly returned, but Hermes-san was nowhere to be seen. The audience murmured and grew restless. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "H-Huh? Hermes-chan?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0018.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "Hermes-chaaaan!!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0019.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "Where did Hermes-chan go!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0574.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Ufufu<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Surprised~~~? I’m over hereーーー<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

    MSG([[ Just as the crowd started fussing, Hermes-san’s voice was heard from the upper balcony at the back of the auditorium. ]])

    MSG([[ And then, in the next moment, from the second floor to the stage―― ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0575.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Wh-What’s... going on...? Why can’t I... come down...?" ]])

    -- //CG：姫神エルメス登場
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV006aa")
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    -- //effect：セピア加工

    MSG([[ At the entrance ceremony, she had leapt down from the stage to captivate the entire student body. ]])

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024cd")
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ But for some reason, Hermes-san was not coming down at all. Only a confused voice echoed from the speaker. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav",1000,true)

    MSG([[ I instinctively thought, 'It’s the effect of the personality integration.' ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0576.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Why are my legs shaking...? I’ve never felt scared of heights like this before... wh-why...?" ]])

    MSG([[ Her voice trembled with fear. Thinking calmly, where Hermes-san was standing was the railing of the second-floor seats, a height that would be life-threatening if she fell. ]])

    MSG([[ Being scared is only natural. ]])

    MSG([[ In fact, it’s strange she hadn’t felt fear until now. ]])

    MSG([[ But why is this the first time she’s experiencing fear in a situation like this...? ]])

    -- //BU：アキラ（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-1000,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-800,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1155.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Minachin, come here for a sec." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira beckoned me from beside the stage, and I slipped away quietly. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024ch")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,800,200)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2371.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-What’s going on?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1156.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "If it goes on like this, Hermes can’t get down. I’ll help bring her down, so draw the audience’s attention." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2372.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Akira, do you have an idea what’s happening with Hermes right now?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1157.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Yeah, roughly. It’s probably quite a troublesome state." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira sighed as she continued explaining. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1158.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Hey, Minachin, you heard from Arurun, right? That Arurun had been taking on all of the negative emotions for her until now." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1159.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "So if even the fear was being borne by Arurun... what do you think the situation is now?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2373.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Does that mean she can’t shift it anymore like before?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1160.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Exactly. Hermes is feeling fear for the first time right now." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1161.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It always seemed off to me. That jumping from the second floor, jumping from helicopters, she lacked too much fear." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1162.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "That’s not because she was brave or fearless. Arurun was the one who scared instead of her." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1163.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Without Arurun, Hermes is just a normal girl. She’d be scared like everyone else, and wouldn’t do reckless things." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1164.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Yeah, like relying on a single lifeline to jump down." ]])

    MSG([[ I see. From Hermes-san’s perspective, things she used to do effortlessly now terrify her. ]])

    MSG([[ So it’s no wonder she froze without fully understanding herself. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2374.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I’ll handle the students. We can’t let everyone in the venue get more anxious." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_AKI01da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1165.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s difficult, but I’ll do it. I’ll work with Lira and the others to get Hermes down safely." ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ Thus began our two-pronged strategy with Akira and me. ]])

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav",1000,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    MSG([[ The sudden end to Hermes-san’s performance left the venue atmosphere chaotic. ]])

    MSG([[ Everyone felt uneasy about Hermes-san. What can we do in this air? ]])

    MSG([[ No, what we can do is clear. As planned, risk it all and express our honest feelings to the audience. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG024cd")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2375.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...There’s no other way." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I took a deep breath and shouted out to the entire auditorium. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1500)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01bb")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2376.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Everyone!! Please listen!!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //SE：なし
STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)

    MSG([[ The murmurs ceased. All eyes in the venue turned to me alone. ]])

    MSG([[ Over five hundred gazes fastened on me, a cold sweat broke out all over. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2377.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hermes-san is preparing a wonderful surprise right now. Until then, please bear with me and listen." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I can’t compare to Hermes-san in singing or dancing. If there’s one way to grab this many people’s attention, there’s only one. ]])

    MSG([[ I touched the wig I had been wearing all this time and forcefully tore it off. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav",1000,true)

    -- //CG：ボク姫様と乙女主義（ウィッグを取ったミナト）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV042aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav",1000,true)

    MSG([[ The audience began murmuring again as they saw my uncovered face. ]])

    MSG([[ Suddenly, a ‘Princess’ on stage removing her wig naturally causes such a reaction. ]])

    MSG([[ To drown out the murmurs, I raised my voice as much as I could and continued speaking. ]])

STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1416.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Everyone... I stood here today as a ‘Princess’ of Yuriai Private Academy, but I’m not really a girl." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1417.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "My real name is Minato Ikusa. I’m a student from the boys’ division who enrolled to investigate the mysterious incident surrounding my sister." ]])

    -- //SE：なし
STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)

    MSG([[ The venue fell silently as if frozen. My voice alone echoed as I spoke without backing down. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1418.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "To uncover Yuriai Academy’s secrets, I had to take the ‘Princess’ position, so I swallowed my bitterness and decided to cross-dress to infiltrate the girls’ division." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1418_02.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I’m truly sorry for deceiving all of you." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0020.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "We didn’t come here to see a guy!? Get offーーーー!!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ —Abuse broke the silence. Once the silence was broken, angry jeers followed in a rush. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0021.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "Hey! Guys, get off quick!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0022.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "What happened to Hermes-chan, you idiot!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("audience_0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Audience】
 "No way I’d vote for a guyー!" ]])

    -- //CG：ボク姫様と乙女主義（ウィッグを外したミナト・笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV042ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ Intense insults directed at me. I smiled back serenely at the expected reaction. ]])

STOP_BGM(1000)
PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav",1000,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1419.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...How about if I said that was a lie?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1420.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "What if I said I’m not a guy but actually a short-haired girl? Would you support me then?" ]])

    -- //SE：どよめき
PLAY_SE("SEf005.wav")

    MSG([[ The audience began murmuring again. Understandably so. ]])

    MSG([[ Because the audience can’t verify my gender. It’s natural they’d feel uneasy. ]])

    MSG([[ Precisely because of that, I knew they would lend an ear to my next words―― ]])


STOP_SE("SEf005.wav",1000)


PLAY_VOICE("minato_1421.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Hermes-san is incredibly cute, right? But even for her, her real gender isn’t known. She always wears clothes and never shows bare skin." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1422.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "This kind of thing isn’t limited to gender. No one can judge what we truly find ‘cute’." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1423.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "But what’s important is whether we ourselves feel something is ‘cute’, isn’t it?" ]])

    MSG([[ No more jeers are heard. Many people seem to be trying to listen to my words. ]])

    MSG([[ Encouraged by that feeling, I continued putting my thoughts into words. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1424.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Until now, I thought 'men must be like this!' — that men should be strong and cool." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1425.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "But now I don’t think that way. I believe that everyone, including men, has the right to be cute." ]])

    MSG([[ Yes, I learned that through my first battle with a rival. ]])

    MSG([[ I used to think makeup and pretending to be a beautiful girl was awful. But trying to perform an ideal self isn’t wrong. ]])

    MSG([[ Now, as Minato Ikusa, ‘Erika Ikusa’, who won support from everyone, I’m proud of who I am. ]])

    MSG([[ The name of that rival is―― ]])

PLAY_SE("SEf002.wav",500,true)
    -- //特殊選択肢→鬼灯リラ

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP05_2_ERU,"初めて競い合った『彼女』の名は――")

STOP_SE("SEf002.wav")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_13", "ERU_EP05_16")
        return
    end


    -- //BG：大講堂正面
